text: وقال فرعون يهمن ابن لى صرحا لعلى ابلغ الاسبب

translations.translation: Pharaoh said, 'Haman, build me a tower so that perhaps I may gain means of access,
The Pharaoh said: "O Haman, build me a lofty tower that I may perhaps find the means
Pharaoh said: “Haman, build for me a lofty tower that I may scale the highways --
Pharaoh said, "Haman, build a tower of baked bricks for me so that I shall have access.
And said Firaun, “O Haman! Build a high palace for me, in order that I may reach the routes.” –
And Fir`awn said: "O Haman! Build me a lofty tower that I may arrive at the ways --
And Firon said: O Haman! build for me a tower that I may attain the means of access,
Pharaoh said, 'Haman, build for me a tower, that haply so I may reach the cords,
And Pharaoh said: O Haman! Build for me a tower that haply I may reach the roads,
Pharaoh said, "O Haman, build for me a lofty building so that I may gain access
And Fir'awn said: O Haman! build for me a tower that haply I may reach the ways of access
Pharaoh said, ‘O Haman! Build me a tower so that I may reach the routes
Pharaoh said: "O Haman! Build me a lofty palace, that I may attain the ways and means-
And Fir'aun (Pharaoh) said: "O Haman! Build me a tower that I may arrive at the ways,
Pharaoh said: 'Haman, build me a tower that I can reach the ways,
And Pharaoh said, “O Hamaan, build me a tower, that I may reach the pathways.
And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -
[40:36]   And Pharaoh said, ‘O Hāmān! Build for me a tower, a lofty edifice, that perhaps I may reach the routes —
(And Pharaoh said) to his aid: (0 Haman! Build for me a tower that haply I may reach the roads) that I may climb up to the gates,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما ظهر أمر موسى وانتشر دينه بين الناس، ودعوته إلى الله الواحد الأحد الموجِد للسماوات العلا والأرضين السفلى، ومالت النفوس إليه لوضوح براهينه وسطوع معجزاته { قَالَ فَرْعَوْنُ } مدبراً في دفع موسى، متأملاً في شأنه، مشاوراً مع وزيره آمراً له، منادياً إياه: { يٰهَامَانُ } قد وقع ما نخاف منه من قبل { ٱبْنِ لِي صَرْحاً } بناء رفيعاً ظاهراً عالياً من جميع الأبنية والقصور { لَّعَـلِّيۤ } بالارتقاء والعروج إليه { أَبْلُغُ ٱلأَسْبَابَ } [غافر: 36] المؤيدة لأمر موسى

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جلّ جلاله: { وقال فرعونُ } تمويهاً على قومه، وجهلاً منه: { يا هامانِ } وزيره { ابنِ لي صَرْحاً } أي: قصراً عالياً، وقيل: الصرح: البناء الظاهر الذي لا يخفى على الناظر وإن بَعُد منه
 يقال: صَرِح الشيءُ: إذا ظهر
 { لعلِّي أبلُغُ الأسبابَ } أي: الطرق
